summary.span: 命名空间包含支持 SQL Server 特定的功能的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that support SQL Server-specific functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关此命名空间中的类所支持的功能的信息，请参阅[在 SQL Server 中](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server)[枚举 SQL Server 的实例（ADO.NET）](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/enumerating-instances-of-sql-server)和查询通知。For information about the functionality that the classes within this namespace support, see [Enumerating Instances of SQL Server (ADO.NET)](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/enumerating-instances-of-sql-server) and [Query Notifications in SQL Server](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server). > [!NOTE] > 在 ADO.NET 版本2.0 的 beta 版本中， 命名空间还包含与 SQL Server 公共语言运行时（CLR）集成一起使用的类。In beta releases of ADO.NET version 2.0, the namespace also contained classes for use with SQL Server common language runtime (CLR) integration. 但是，这些类已移动到其自己的命名空间中，。However, those classes have been moved into their own namespace, . 有关使用 SQL Server CLR 集成的详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server 公共语言运行时集成](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/sql-server-common-language-runtime-integration)。For more information about using SQL Server CLR integration, see [SQL Server Common Language Runtime Integration](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/sql-server-common-language-runtime-integration).
